actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals commemorating the American Indian heritage.

summary.text: Provides that, in commemoration of the American Indian heritage, the Secretary of the Treasury shall strike and deliver to the Mid-American All-Indian Center, Incorporated, of Wichita, Kansas, sterling and bronze medals which shall be national medals to be disposed of by the center at a premium.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals commemorating the American Indian heritage.
